channel.title: Delta(Blind Scape) Oldschool 317
channel.description:
-Information: -Blank BlindScape (Delta) -All Skills From BlindScape Because i did not want to temper with it. -Great Base For Rs Remakes And OldSchool Servers
Client Features: -317 Client With 459 gameframe loading from cache. -Very Clean and has no models or anything -Plays the basic runescape login midi you can change it easily,: not going to spoon feed :p
Media [IMG]http://img810.imageshack.us/img810/329/67144804.png[/img] [IMG]http://img810.imageshack.us/img810/3879/57172842.png[/img]
I DO NOT CARE IF YOU DON"T LIKE DELTA, SOME PEOPLE DO SO IF YOU ARE GOING TO FLAME, FLAME ABOUT SOMETHING ELSE NOT BECAUSE OF SOURCE!.
Downloads [url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/58997831/RuneScape.zip]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/58997831/RuneScape.zip[/url]
Credits: Makers Of BlindScape (Base) 100% and Eselyium Client Blank 317 Client Base - 100% Eselyium THIS IS NOT MY WORK, JUST FOR PEOPLE TO ENJOY :)

item.title: Delta(Blind Scape) Oldschool 317
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“LumbysChild, post:12, topic:442810”][quote author=nickog15 link=topic=545497.msg3999680#msg3999680 date=1337788818]
You have done nothing, not to be mean but go look in the tutorial section and add something to your server. I see your a noobie coder[no offence] but you need to get better at your work before your release this. Please lock.
[/quote]
Im currently adding in features but the actionTimers are not working as planned I will be updating this as and when I finish :)[/quote]
People say “planned” to seem pro. Is “planned” to you meaning everything is done for you? What are they suppose to be “planned”?
